page.title: 15Problems of Transport
page.content: If you live in Littleton your own form of transport is a virtual necessity. No bus service runs through the village although a mini-bus leaves the village at 10.00a.m. each Friday for a shopping excursion to nearby Thornbury. The villagers of Aust are better served by public transport. Buses run from the Motoring Service Area to Bristol at approximately two hourly intervals. However,there are no buses after about seven o'clock in the evening. For those with cars getting about the area is not difficult as even the minor roads are quite good.
